item.title: Nearshoring Without Growth: Why Investment Uncertainty Is Holding Mexico Back
item.description: CSIS Americas Fellow Diego Marroquin Bitar and Director Ryan C. Berg analyze how investment uncertainty is keeping Mexico from realizing its economic potential amid global trade tensions.
